Text: It's a nice DVD all in all... the information is slightly superficial, though, but a good staring point if you want to learn at least something about the country, its controversial past and *ahem* bright future ;)

Latvia... the first time I saw a beaver was near Cesic. (The furry animal with the wood-fetish, not the female bodypart... * tsk*)

Hope the DVD isn't all about Riga; there's much much more to see in Latvia.
Did you mention Beaver?Now seriously I m interested in visiting Latvia in a near future so this will be handy!Thanks!
